content.text:
*Hello Shriya Vallabh,*  

I hope you're doing well! This is [Your Name], your financial advisor.  

As we approach 2025, it’s essential to adopt smart investment strategies. A great option is to start a Systematic Investment Plan (SIP) in mutual funds. SIPs allow you to invest a fixed amount regularly, which helps in averaging out costs and reducing market volatility risks.  

*Consider this:* If you invest ₹5,000 monthly in a mutual fund with an expected return of 12% per annum, after 5 years, you could accumulate approximately ₹3.8 lakhs!  

Always remember, investments are subject to market risks. Please read all scheme-related documents carefully before investing.  

*EUIN: E243438*  

Best regards,  
[Your Name]  
[Your Contact Information]
